paragraph-1: We envision a world where all people hold the power to create opportunity for themselves and others.
paragraph-2: Dreams are universal, but opportunity is not. Billions of people around the world can’t access the financial means to work towards their dreams.
paragraph-3: Kiva is an international nonprofit, founded in 2005 and based San Francisco, that celebrates and supports people looking to create a better future for themselves, their families and their communities. We exist to connect and empower them, one loan at a time.
paragraph-4: By lending as little as $25 on Kiva, anyone can help a borrower start or grow a business, go to school, access clean energy, or realize their potential. For some, it’s a matter of survival, for others it’s the fuel for a life-long ambition.
